title: $:/plugins/xp/link-to-tabs
author: Mario Pietsch
name: Link to Tabs
description: Internal links are added to tabs if selected
readme:
This is a custom modification of the [[Link to Tabs(v2.3.0)|https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/link-to-tabs/]] plugin. Changed the plugin name to differentiate. * Functionality freezes to avoid environmental anomalies caused by upgrading plugins * You can open the tab by holding down the Ctrl key and clicking on it. so you can leave the icon off. * Hold down the Alt key and click to divert the tab to another column.
This plugin adds a little link icon to every tab. ! Link-to-Tabs Settings {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to-tabs}} ''Important:'' This plugin modifies a core module and templates
